mapper.select: SELECT user_name,user_login,user_pass,locked FROM sys_user WHERE user_login = #{login}

SELECT a.`id`,a.`user_name`,a.`user_login`,a.`locked`,a.`user_role`,b.name AS role_name FROM sys_user AS a LEFT JOIN sys_role AS b ON a.user_role = b.`id` WHERE a.`id` > 0
AND LOCATE(#{name},a.`user_name`) > 0
AND LOCATE(#{login},a.`user_login`) > 0
AND a.`user_role` = #{role}
LIMIT #{page},10

SELECT a.`id`,a.`user_name`,a.`user_login`,a.`locked`,a.`user_role`,b.name AS role_name, a.company,a.dept,a.note,a.image,a.identity_code,a.address,a.qq,a.wx,a.phone,a.email FROM sys_user AS a LEFT JOIN sys_role AS b ON a.user_role = b.`id` WHERE a.`id` = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(a.`id`) FROM sys_user AS a LEFT JOIN sys_role AS b ON a.user_role = b.`id` WHERE a.`id` > 0
AND LOCATE(#{name},a.`user_name`) > 0
AND LOCATE(#{login},a.`user_login`) > 0
AND a.`user_role` = #{role}
